translation.en: [reporter] Have you heard about Kai, the hitchhiking hatchet hero?
translation.fr: Vous connaissez Kai, l'autostoppeurà la hachette devenu héros ?

translation.en: If you haven't, you will.
translation.fr: Voici son histoire.

translation.en: It's the hottest video on the Internet right now.
translation.fr: C'est la vidéola plus populaire sur Internet.

translation.en: -What do you wanna talk about? -What happened?
translation.fr: - Parler de quoi ?- De l'incident.

translation.en: [reporter] This was not a typical news story. It may have started out as one,
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas un reportage ordinaire.Ça l'était au début,

translation.en: but it very quickly progressed into a heck of a lot more.
translation.fr: mais très vite,ça a pris une ampleur démesurée.

translation.en: I mean, there's no doubt that day Kai was a hero.
translation.fr: Kai a bel et bien été un héros ce jour-là.

translation.en: Everyone around the world wanted a piece of this kid.
translation.fr: Le monde entier s'arrachait ce gamin.

translation.en: He could have had anything he wanted. I mean, he could have had the money, the fame.
translation.fr: Il aurait pu tout avoir.L'argent, la célébrité…

translation.en: But this dude that I introduced the world to went, in the matter of three months,
translation.fr: Mais en trois mois,ce type que j'ai présenté au monde entier

translation.en: from this amazing, heroic, beautiful person
translation.fr: est passé d'incroyable héros

translation.en: to wanted by authorities for murder.
translation.fr: à criminel recherché par la policepour meurtre.

translation.en: -So it's a really fucked-up story. -[phone vibrating]
translation.fr: C'est vraiment une histoire de taré.

translation.en: He's calling right now.
translation.fr: Il m'appelle.

translation.en: -[woman] Who is? -Kai.
translation.fr: - Qui ça ?- Kai.

translation.en: -Hello? -[robotic voice] You have a prepaid call.
translation.fr: - Allô ?- Vous avez un appel prépayé.

translation.en: You will not be charged for this call.
translation.fr: Il ne vous sera pas facturé.

translation.en: This call is from an inmate at the New Jersey State Prison.
translation.fr: Cet appel provient d'un détenude la Prison d'État du New Jersey.

translation.en: This call will be monitored and recorded.
translation.fr: Il sera surveillé et enregistré.

translation.en: [reporter 2] When we began to hear about this next story in the newsroom
translation.fr: On a découvert ce sujetdans la salle de rédaction

translation.en: a little after 2:00 p.m. this afternoon,
translation.fr: un peu après 14 h cet après-midi.

translation.en: it sounded very strange.
translation.fr: Il nous a semblé très étrange.

translation.en: And, as KMPH news anchor Jessob Reisbeck shows us,
translation.fr: Et, d'après Jessob Reisbeck,de la chaîne KMPH,

translation.en: it only got crazier.
translation.fr: le plus fou était encore à venir.

translation.en: [Jessob] It's February 1st 2013.
translation.fr: On est le 1er février 2013.

translation.en: I had been tabbed to report news that day.
translation.fr: Ce jour-là,je suis envoyé spécial sur place.

translation.en: And over the scanner came,
translation.fr: Via mon scanner radio, j'entends :

translation.en: "There's been a car accident. It looks pretty bad."
translation.fr: "On a un accident de voiture grave.

translation.en: "There's someone pinned between the car and a utility vehicle."
translation.fr: "Quelqu'un est coincéentre la voiture et un utilitaire.

translation.en: "The driver's yelling crazy things." "'I'm Jesus Christ." "All Black people deserve to die.'"
translation.fr: "Le conducteur se prend pour le Christet hurle des "mort aux noirs"."

translation.en: Racist things. Terrible things.
translation.fr: Des trucs racistes.

translation.en: An absolute bizarre scene here in West Fresno at the corner of McKinley and Marks.
translation.fr: Un accident étrangeà une intersection de West Fresno.

translation.en: I was a sports anchor and reporter,
translation.fr: J'étais journaliste sportif,

translation.en: and, for whatever reason, we were short on news reporters.
translation.fr: mais ce jour-là,la chaîne manquait de reporters.

translation.en: So this was literally my first day covering news,
translation.fr: C'était donc la première foisque je couvrais l'actualité,

translation.en: and it turned out to be,
translation.fr: et autant vous dire

translation.en: man, something else.
translation.fr: que je n'étais pas prêt.

translation.en: A man plows his car into a PG&E worker,
translation.fr: Un homme a percutéet coincé un technicien

translation.en: pinning him against his truck, because the worker was Black.
translation.fr: contre son camion,parce qu'il était noir.

translation.en: And innocent bystanders come to the rescue.
translation.fr: Des passants sont venus à son secours.

translation.en: He must have done this on purpose. Like, he tried to kill this dude.
translation.fr: C'était prémédité, il a voulu le tuer.

translation.en: My mom ran to the driver to make sure he was okay 'cause we thought maybe it was just an accident.
translation.fr: Ma mère s'est assuré qu'il allait bien.On pensait que c'était un accident.

translation.en: He just kept saying he was Jesus Christ
translation.fr: Il répétait : "Je suis Jésus Christ,

translation.en: and he's gonna save all of us and that, but we have to get…
translation.fr: "je viens vous sauver, mais nous devons…"

translation.en: He used the N word, meaning the Black people and that. He said we need to get them off of the earth.
translation.fr: Il a utilisé une insulte racialeet appelé à éliminer tous les noirs.

translation.en: [Jessob] The driver ends up being this 6'4", 300-pound huge guy.
translation.fr: Le conducteur est un mastodonted'1,95 m pour 140 kg.

translation.en: Then he turns to this woman that tried to come and help and starts to physically hurt her, got her in a bear hug,
translation.fr: Il s'en prend à cette femme qui aidele technicien et commencer à la serrer,

translation.en: is choking her.
translation.fr: à l'étouffer.

translation.en: [Jessob] All of a sudden, she said the passenger, who looked like a hitchhiker, a homeless guy,
translation.fr: Elle raconte que le passager,un autostoppeur visiblement sans-abri,

translation.en: comes and attacks the driver and saves her.
translation.fr: attaque le conducteur pour la sauver.

translation.en: And, as I'm doing this interview,
translation.fr: Pendant mon reportage,

translation.en: I look across this two-lane farm road and down walking on the other side of the road
translation.fr: je regarde de l'autre côté de la routeet je vois s'avancer

translation.en: was a guy with long hair, a bandana, a really big backpack,
translation.fr: un type aux cheveux longsavec un bandana et un gros sac à dos

translation.en: and not to stereotype, but looked like a homeless hitchhiker.
translation.fr: aux airs de sans-abri,sans vouloir stéréotyper.

translation.en: -Can we talk to you? Do you mind? -What do you wanna talk about?
translation.fr: - Vous voulez bien nous parler ?- De quoi ?

translation.en: What happened today?
translation.fr: Ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: Well, went straight outta Dogtown.
translation.fr: Je débarque de Dogtown à Santa Monica.

translation.en: Skateboarding, surfing it up…
translation.fr: J'y ai fait du skate, du surf.

translation.en: The first thing he wanted to do was send a loving message
translation.fr: Il commence par faire passerun message d'amour

translation.en: to whoever sees this interview. It's powerful. It gives me goosebumps.
translation.fr: à quiconque verra l'interview.J'en ai des frissons.

translation.en: He'd been through this crazy, what to most people would be a traumatic situation,
translation.fr: Il a vécu ce qui serait pour beaucoupune expérience traumatique,

translation.en: and he looked right in the camera…
translation.fr: mais il dit à la caméra…

translation.en: Before I say anything else, I wanna say no matter what you've done, you deserve respect.
translation.fr: Avant tout, je tiens à direque tout le monde mérite le respect.

translation.en: Even if you make mistakes, you're lovable,
translation.fr: Tout le monde mérite d'être aimé,

translation.en: and it doesn't matter your looks, skills, or age, size, or anything,
translation.fr: quel que soit son physique,son âge, ou son poids.

translation.en: you're worthwhile. No one can ever take that away from you. Now…
translation.fr: Vous êtes important,et personne ne peut vous enlever ça. Bon…

translation.en: He just had such a different perspective of what he was supposed to do in that moment.
translation.fr: Sa perspective était en décalageavec ce qui venait de se passer.

translation.en: [hitchhiker] I look over. The guy's pinned there. Buddy gets out. These two women are trying to help him.
translation.fr: Le type est coincé, deux femmes l'aident.Le conducteur sort.

translation.en: He runs up, and he grabs one of them, man.
translation.fr: Il chope l'une des deux femmes.

translation.en: A guy that big can snap a woman's neck like a pencil stick.
translation.fr: Vu sa taille,il aurait pu lui briser le cou,

translation.en: So I fucking ran up behind him with a hatchet.
translation.fr: alors, j'arrive avec ma hachette

translation.en: Smash! Smash! Smash!
translation.fr: et bam, bam, bam !

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: Voilà.

translation.en: Who would expect a hatchet-wielding hitchhiker to be coming to save the day?
translation.fr: Qui s'attendait à ce qu'un autostoppeurmuni d'une hachette sauve la situation ?

translation.en: I was blown away. Absolutely blown away,
translation.fr: Je n'en revenais pas.

translation.en: 'cause you looked at him and he's rough around the edges, and then you see
translation.fr: Ce type un peu brut de décoffrages'avère en fait

translation.en: the treasure he truly was.
translation.fr: être un véritable trésor.

translation.en: That woman was in danger.
translation.fr: Elle était en danger.

translation.en: He just finished, what looked like at the time, killing somebody.
translation.fr: Il venait juste de tuer quelqu'un,du moins, aurait dit,

translation.en: If I hadn't done that, he would've killed more people.
translation.fr: et je l'ai empêché de recommencer.

translation.en: [woman] Did it strike you as odd that he had a hatchet?
translation.fr: La hachette ne vous a pas surpris ?

translation.en: Did it-- Not really. I mean, I just--
translation.fr: Non, pas vraiment. Enfin…

translation.en: You know, I figured being kind of a homeless transient, a hatchet would be a good thing to have, you know.
translation.fr: Je me suis dit qu'un sans-abri en transitpourrait avoir besoin d'une hachette.

translation.en: He saw a woman that was in danger. "I'm gonna help her."
translation.fr: Il voit une femme en danger,il va l'aider.

translation.en: But how willing and able he was to use it on another person's skull,
translation.fr: Mais le voir fracasser un crâne avecsans sourciller,

translation.en: maybe, yeah. That's kinda shocking.
translation.fr: ça, oui, c'était choquant.

translation.en: [Jessob] How'd you get in his car? I was… I was hitchhiking. Well, good thing I was hitchhiking.
translation.fr: - Que faisiez-vous dans sa voiture ?- Je faisais du stop. Et tant mieux.

translation.en: Yeah, people say, "Don't hitchhike. This is what happens."
translation.fr: Tout le monde ditque faire du stop est dangereux.

translation.en: -Yeah, well, at least I was here. -[Jessob] Can I get your name?
translation.fr: - Heureusement que j'étais là.- Votre nom ?

translation.en: -I'm Kai. -[Jessob] Can I get the spelling for it?
translation.fr: - Kai.- Vous me l'épelez ?

translation.en: -Straight outta Dogtown. K-A-I. -[Jessob] Do you have a last name?
translation.fr: - De Dogtown. K-A-I.- Vous avez un nom de famille ?

translation.en: No, bro. I don't have anything.
translation.fr: Non, mec. J'ai rien du tout.

translation.en: As crazy as things got here, the best news is,
translation.fr: Cet incident chaotique se termine bien.

translation.en: somehow, luckily, none of the injuries suffered are life-threatening,
translation.fr: Aucune personne impliquéen'a subi de blessures mortelles.

translation.en: and the guy driving that car is right where he belongs, in police custody.
translation.fr: Le conducteur a été placé en garde à vue,et à juste titre.

translation.en: In West Fresno, Jessob Reisbeck, KMPH News.
translation.fr: Jessob Reisbeck,KMPH News, en direct de Fresno.

translation.en: After I finished the interview, reporters from other stations came up to him.
translation.fr: Après l'interview,les reporters d'autres chaînes

translation.en: and said, of course, "Can we talk to you?"
translation.fr: ont voulu l'interroger aussi.

translation.en: This guy was the most charismatic dude ever. He's gonna talk to everyone. He wants everyone to see him.
translation.fr: Il est tellement charismatique.Il va vouloir parler, passer à la télé.

translation.en: For whatever reason, he said, "Nope. I'm not talking to anyone else," and left.
translation.fr: Mais il a dit : "Je parlerai à personne"avant de disparaître.

translation.en: And when that happened, I knew.
translation.fr: Et c'est là que j'ai compris.

translation.en: Holy shit. We got something really special now,
translation.fr: Bordel.On tient un sacré sujet d'actualité.

translation.en: because we're gonna be the only one with this interview.
translation.fr: On est la seule chaîneà avoir pu l'interroger.

translation.en: When you look at a story, any story, if you're going to tell a story,
translation.fr: Dans toutes les histoires,tous les récits,

translation.en: you need a villain,
translation.fr: il y a un méchant,

translation.en: you need an unlikely hero,
translation.fr: un héros improbable,

translation.en: you need an amazing scenario, and you need someone in distress,
translation.fr: un scénario hors du commun,et une personne en détresse,

translation.en: and this had all of that.
translation.fr: On avait tout ça.

translation.en: Yeah, it was fucking gnarly, man.
translation.fr: Ouais, c'était violent, mec.

translation.en: Holy shit. It was like the biggest wave I've ever ridden in my life.
translation.fr: C'est la plus grosse vagueque j'ai jamais surfée.

translation.en: We knew we had gold on our hands.
translation.fr: On tenait le bon filon.

translation.en: That night I decided I wanted the world to see the entire interview,
translation.fr: Ce soir-là, j'ai décidé de montrerl'interview intégrale au monde entier.

translation.en: the six-plus minutes of interview,
translation.fr: Les six minutes d'entretien.

translation.en: because, up until this point, people had only been able to see
translation.fr: Parce que jusque-là, les gens n'avaient vu

translation.en: the minute-and-a-half piece that I'd put on the news.
translation.fr: que la minute et demiediffusée au journal.

translation.en: So I put it on YouTube, I clicked "upload,"
translation.fr: Alors, je l'ai mise en ligne sur YouTube

translation.en: and then I went to bed.
translation.fr: et je suis allé me coucher.

translation.en: I woke up the next morning, and my world was different.
translation.fr: Au réveil, mon mondevenait d'être chamboulé.

translation.en: It was a game changer in my life, for sure, just uploading that video.
translation.fr: Mettre cette vidéo en lignea bouleversé ma vie.

translation.en: I had my own YouTube channel, and I had about 20 followers.
translation.fr: J'avais une chaîne YouTube avec une vingtaine d'abonnés.

translation.en: And I put it up when I got home, and I looked at it that night,
translation.fr: Je l'ai mise en ligne en rentrant,et dans la soirée,

translation.en: and it's like, "Oh, it's gotten about 20 hits."
translation.fr: j'ai vu qu'elle avait faitune vingtaine de vues.

translation.en: "That's nice. That's average. Cool."
translation.fr: "C'est pas mal."

translation.en: Jessob called me the next day. He's all, "Terry, dude!"
translation.fr: Le lendemain, Jessob m'appelle :"Terry, mec !"

translation.en: Just like, "Yeah, Jessob? What?"
translation.fr: "Oui, Jessob ? Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?"

translation.en: He's like, "Have you seen your video?"
translation.fr: "Tu as vu ta vidéo ?"

translation.en: It's like, "Oh yeah, it was doing good. I think it was about at 20 or 30 people."
translation.fr: "Oui, elle a bien marché,elle a fait 20 ou 30 vues."

translation.en: I thought it was good. He's like, "Dude, it's at, like, half a million."
translation.fr: Je trouvais ça bien, mais il me sort :"Elle a fait 500 000 vues."

translation.en: I knew that day
translation.fr: Ce jour-là, j'ai compris

translation.en: that Kai the Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker was born.
translation.fr: que la légende de Kai,l'autostoppeur à la hachette, était née.

translation.en: Now, this stuff right here, I was driving…
translation.fr: Alors, j'étais dans la voiture…

translation.en: -Smash! Smash! Smash! -[laughs]
translation.fr: Bam, bam, bam !

translation.en: -Smash! -Smash!
translation.fr: - Bam !- Bam !

translation.en: He literally has a hatchet in his hand.
translation.fr: Il a une hachette à la main.

translation.en: I'm absolutely obsessed with this guy.
translation.fr: Je suis obsédée par ce type.

translation.en: This guy's my fucking hero!
translation.fr: C'est mon héros, putain !

translation.en: Kai the Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker.
translation.fr: Kai, l'autostoppeur à la hachette.

translation.en: Fuck yeah.
translation.fr: Grave.

translation.en: Every time you would refresh, someone else had taken the video and reposted it,
translation.fr: À chaque fois que j'actualisais,la vidéo avait été repostée,

translation.en: and that had tens or hundreds of thousands of views.
translation.fr: et visionnée 10 000, ou 100 000 fois.

translation.en: So it was just literally like a snowball that rolled and rolled,
translation.fr: Ça a fait un vrai effet boule de neige.

translation.en: and the Internet just fed into it.
translation.fr: Internet s'en est emparé.

translation.en: ♪ I'm Kai ♪
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Kai

translation.en: [Jessob] There's dozens and dozens of different autotunes and different songs. It was insane.
translation.fr: Il y a eu dizaines de versions musicalesavec de l'autotune. C'était de la folie.

translation.en: ♪ Smash, smash, smash! ♪
translation.fr: Bam, bam, bam !

translation.en: I mean, the memes? Gimme a break, dude. That guy is a walking meme.
translation.fr: Sans parler des mèmes.Ce type est un mème ambulant.

translation.en: He might have started memes.
translation.fr: Il a inventé les mèmes.

translation.en: ♪ People say, "Don't hitchhike" ♪
translation.fr: Le stop est dangereux

translation.en: ♪ Well, good thing I was hitchhiking ♪
translation.fr: Mais heureusement que j'étais là

translation.en: ♪ That woman was in danger ♪
translation.fr: La femme est en danger

translation.en: ♪ So I ran up behind him with a hatchet ♪
translation.fr: Alors j'arrive avec ma hachette

translation.en: ♪ Smash, smash, smash! ♪
translation.fr: Bam, bam, bam !

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, yeah ♪
translation.fr: Ouais, ouais

translation.en: ♪ If he'd started driving that car again ♪ ♪ There'd be a hell of a lot Of bodies around here ♪
translation.fr: S'il avait repris la routeIl aurait laissé des corps partout

translation.en: ♪ Dude, that guy was fucking kooked ♪
translation.fr: Cet enfoiré était taré

translation.en: ♪ He can snap a woman's neck Like a pencil stick ♪
translation.fr: Vu sa taille,il aurait pu lui briser le cou.

translation.en: ♪ So I started smashing him in the head ♪
translation.fr: Alors je lui ai explosé le crâne

translation.en: ♪ Smash, smash, smash! ♪
translation.fr: Bam, bam, bam !

translation.en: Axe-wielding hitchhikers.
translation.fr: Des autostoppeurs munis de hachettes.

translation.en: I can't tell you how many times I've rolled up my windows
translation.fr: Si vous saviez combien de foisj'ai dû remonter ma vitre

translation.en: and sped past a hobo sharpening a hatchet.
translation.fr: en passant devant un clodoqui aiguisait sa hache.

translation.en: When I saw Stephen Colbert do his skit,
translation.fr: Quand j'ai vu le sketchde Stephen Colbert…

translation.en: I mean, I didn't watch Colbert that much until then, and then I became an instant fan of his show. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Avant ça, je ne le regardais pas beaucoup,mais je suis devenu fan.

translation.en: For the first time in human history, people are saying,
translation.fr: C'est la première fois de l'histoirequ'on entend :

translation.en: "Boy, we sure are lucky that homeless hitchhiker was carrying a hatchet."
translation.fr: "Ouf, heureusementque cet autostoppeur avait une hachette."

translation.en: Kai equalled ratings. It equalled ratings because he was fresh and interesting.
translation.fr: Kai est devenu synonyme d'audience.Il a captivé les gens.

translation.en: People liked him, and ratings equal money.
translation.fr: Et qui dit audience, dit argent.

translation.en: So everyone was wanting a piece of him, to jump on the Kai train, as it were.
translation.fr: Tout le monde voulait l'interviewer,pour participer au phénomène Kai.

translation.en: My name is Brad Mulcahy.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Brad Mulcahy.

translation.en: In 2013, I was the human interest researcher
translation.fr: En 2013, j'étais chercheur en faits divers

translation.en: for the late-night television show Jimmy Kimmel Live.
translation.fr: pour le Jimmy Kimmel Live,en fin de soirée.

translation.en: [announcer] Ready or not, here's Jimmy Kimmel!
translation.fr: Prêts ou pas, voici Jimmy Kimmel !

translation.en: [Brad] My job is to find interesting stories
translation.fr: Je dénichais des histoires intéressantes

translation.en: or interesting clips and bring them to rehearsal or email them to Jimmy
translation.fr: et j'envoyais les vidéos à Jimmypour qu'il les répète.

translation.en: or to track down what Jimmy likes.
translation.fr: Je ciblais ses centres d'intérêt.

translation.en: Then I try to find that person to get them on within 36 hours.
translation.fr: Puis je m'assurais qu'on invitela personne sur le plateau sous 36 heures.

translation.en: We tend to air things that are funny.
translation.fr: On passait des clips drôles.

translation.en: Leave Britney alone!
translation.fr: Laissez Britney tranquille !

translation.en: We especially like people who are genuine
translation.fr: On aime les gens authentiques,

translation.en: and whose reaction to something unexpected is genuine.
translation.fr: qui réagissent à l'inattendude façon authentique.

translation.en: And the best example that I can think of at the moment is Paul Vasquez, who was the double rainbow guy.
translation.fr: Je pense tout de suite à Paul Vasquezet son double arc-en-ciel.

translation.en: So this gentleman is in Yosemite Park,
translation.fr: Il est dans le Parc de Yosemite,

translation.en: and one day in the park, he's filming a rainbow,
translation.fr: et alors qu'il filme un arc-en-ciel,

translation.en: and as he's filming it, a second rainbow begins.
translation.fr: un deuxième apparaît.

translation.en: [Paul] Whoa! My God! Oh my God!
translation.fr: Waouh ! Mon Dieu !

translation.en: [laughs] Oh my God! Whoo!
translation.fr: Oh mon Dieu !

translation.en: And at that point, it only had tens of thousands of views.
translation.fr: La vidéo n'avait quequelques dizaines de milliers de vues.

translation.en: And then once we get him on the show, it went up over 45 million.
translation.fr: Après son passage dans l'émission,c'est monté à 45 millions.

translation.en: Were you or were you not ingesting or inhaling some sort of illegal substance when you made that--
translation.fr: Étiez-vous sous l'emprisede substances illégales à ce moment-là ?

translation.en: Absolutely not. I was completely sober. In that video.
translation.fr: Absolument pas. J'étais sobre.Dans cette vidéo.

translation.en: The first time I saw the video of Kai, it was intoxicating,
translation.fr: En voyant la vidéo de Kai, je l'ai trouvée grisante.

translation.en: not to mention that he did genuinely help two human beings who were in peril.
translation.fr: Sans parler du fait qu'il avait aidéde bon cœur deux personnes en péril.

translation.en: And it was brilliant.
translation.fr: C'était génial.

translation.en: I went to rehearsal, and I believe I was told almost immediately,
translation.fr: Je commence les répétitionset on me dit tout de suite :

translation.en: "We'd like to see if you can find that gentleman."
translation.fr: "Essayez de trouver ce jeune homme."

translation.en: Hey, buddy! Good boy.
translation.fr: Coucou ! Bon chien.

translation.en: Who's a good boy, baby?
translation.fr: Tu es un bon chien.

translation.en: Of course everybody wants to be famous, but who has that "it factor"?
translation.fr: On veut tous être célèbres,mais il faut ce petit truc en plus.

translation.en: What is that thing that is just so mesmerizing
translation.fr: Comment expliquerqu'une personne puisse nous captiver

translation.en: that you can't take your eyes off somebody, that is, like… "What are they gonna do next?"
translation.fr: au point qu'on se demandece qu'elle va bien pouvoir faire ensuite ?

translation.en: One of the biggest shows that I had the privilege of working on
translation.fr: J'ai eu le privilègede travailler sur l'émission

translation.en: was Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
translation.fr: L'incroyable famille Kardashian.

translation.en: [announcer] Don't miss the season premiere of The Kardashians.
translation.fr: Ne manquez pas le premier épisode.

translation.en: And I think the appeal with Kai was,
translation.fr: Si le personnage de Kai a plu aux gens,

translation.en: most people that are heroes are not homeless people.

Well, welcome, Kai. Welcome. How are you?
